## blockRendering.Renderer.makeDrawer\_() method

Create a new instance of the renderer's drawer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected makeDrawer_(block: BlockSvg, info: RenderInfo): Drawer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) | The block to render. |
|  info | RenderInfo | An object containing all information needed to render this block.  The drawer. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Drawer
